scripts.build: tsc && npx pkg ./dist/app.js -t node18-win-x64 -c package.json -o build/McfalloutBot.exe
scripts.build:mac: tsc && npx pkg ./dist/app.js -t node18-macos-x64 -c package.json -o build/McfalloutBot.app
scripts.build:linux: tsc && npx pkg ./dist/app.js -t node18-linux-x64 -c package.json -o build/McfalloutBot-linux
